}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:01.779
    | text      = And so I noticed a number of things surrounding, in particular, the end of April in 2009, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:09.279
    | text      = is when the H1N1 swine flu pandemic was really getting going and the first cases were identified.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:19.839
    | text      = And I started to recognize there are some things that would be well worth our time to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = look at as it relates to Alex's behavior in the present day and draw some connections
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:32.279

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:33.279
    | text      = Almost like maybe there's a template.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:34.279
    | text      = Almost.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:35.279
    | text      = So I want to start off with a little bit of a comment, and that is that I mean in no way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:40.839
    | text      = to minimize the impact of the 2009 H1N1 outbreak in this episode.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:45.800
    | text      = I'm not minimizing or belittling it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:47.720
    | text      = It was a serious public health event and a lot of people got sick and died.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:51.079
    | text      = But I think it's very clear from history that it wasn't as severe an event as what we're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:54.560
    | text      = living through in the present.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:56.879
    | text      = The point of this episode that I put together today is to look at some of Alex's coverage
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:00.339
    | text      = from the early days of H1N1 or the swine flu outbreak to highlight the ways that his rhetoric
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:05.600
    | text      = was almost identical to the ways he behaved in the early days of the COVID pandemic at
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:09.720
    | text      = the beginning of 2020.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:11.879
    | text      = Alex's tone has changed a bit since that point, but it's my contention that he's only had
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:16.079
    | text      = to change his rhetoric because he fucked up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:18.920
    | text      = Over the course of this, I'm going to argue that Alex has a method of responding to things
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:22.319
    | text      = like novel outbreaks that has absolutely nothing to do with the reality of the situation, but
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:26.839
    | text      = is actually motivated by the utility that this method has in terms of building and pushing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:31.519
    | text      = predetermined narratives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.019
    | text      = These central narratives are the virus is man-made, it's a bioweapon, it was deployed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:38.759
    | text      = in order to put in martial law, it was deployed in order to make people get vaccines, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:43.320
    | text      = that the vaccines will be mandated and they're secretly meant to hurt you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:47.679
    | text      = In addition to these narratives, I contend that Alex also uses some hallmark techniques
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:51.419
    | text      = in order to reinforce his narratives, and uses set strategies in order to get his message
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:00.500
    | text      = borne out, and I hope that looking at this will be helpful in terms of understanding
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:04.440
    | text      = how meaningless Alex's stories about the present pandemic really are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:08.840

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:12.879
    | text      = right now because he fucked up, and what I mean by that is this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:16.539

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:20.639
    | text      = that he used at the beginning of the COVID outbreak.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:23.659
    | text      = In these instances, whether it was the avian flu in 2005, Ebola in 2014, or H1N1 in 2009,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:31.259
    | text      = the public health response was competent, and we got lucky, so the diseases didn't end
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = That's the sweet spot for someone like Alex to work in.
}}

}}

}}

}}

    | text      = move on to another subject altogether.
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

}}
